idea:
AI

Engagely's core engine uses NLP and machine intelligence to deliver intelligent conversations, helping enterprises to drive sales, improve customer support and service, reduce operational cost and improve NPS.

Conversational Intelligence

Engagely is powered with NLP that enables it to make the conversations more human-like. It is pre-trained on rich datasets and gets finetuned with every conversation.

Quick Deployment

The 'No-code platform' enables business users to create bots in literally one click and without writing any line of code. Journeys can be added so easily that making a bot and making a presentation feels the same.
